password.text: Passwords must be at least 6 characters long, and include a lowercase letter, uppercase letter and number. No special characters are allowed.

className.text: You can use letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, and underscores. No other characters are allowed.

classId.text: You can use letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, and underscores. No other characters are allowed.

name.text: You can use letters, numbers, and spaces. No other characters are allowed.

number.text: It must be a valid number.
